intro: Werneria nuda, commonly known as the naked werneria, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, white to pinkish flowers. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Werneria nuda is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
